thread.title: Oleg Linnik
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par Oleg Linnik

author: Oleg Linnik
title: Oleg Linnik
text: I placed an order on February 9 for the flowers to be delivered on February 14 with specific instructions. Flowers have never been delivered despite my many calls. I was told by your representative that the flowers WILL be delivered, but they never did. I demand an apology to the recipient and a full refund of the money.
